title.rendered: Top 5 Photo Vault Apps For Android [2020 – RANKED]

content.rendered:
There are hundreds of photo vault apps for Android, but which ones are the best? In this article, we’ll compare the top five photo vaults and rank our favorites in order. 

1. Cover

We might be a tad bit biased, but the Cover team takes pride in the fact that we built an unparalleled photo vault. Cover is not only an encrypted, secure photo & video vault, but it also monitors your device for sensitive content. Making Cover an end-to-end solution for all of your privacy needs. 

Here’s our current list of distinctive features:

  • Hide Photos & Videos: Manually hide any photo or video files 
  • Password: PIN, pattern, or fingerprint  
  • Encryption: Cover is fully encrypted & private 
  • Real-time Protection: Sensitive content will automatically be hidden
  • Smart Notifications: You’ll be notified if sensitive files are detected
  • Messaging Blocking: Automatically block any sensitive content sent via Messenger, Telegram, Whatsapp, & more

2. Norton App Lock

Norton App Lock isn’t necessarily a photo vault, however, you can use the app to securely lock your photo gallery. Because Norton has been a trusted security company since 1982, we’re including App Lock in our list. 

  • Add passcode security to apps that don’t have it
  • Protect private data and photos from the prying eyes of intruders
  • Keep app content private if you share your device with kids or friends to play games or watch videos
  • Add a layer of security in case your device is lost or stolen
  • Prevent embarrassing “pocket-dial” accidents

3. Keepsafe 

Keepsafe is one of the most popular photo vault apps available on Google Play. It boasts many features and is one of the safest tools to use to protect your content.

Features:

  • Password: PIN, pattern, or fingerprint.
  • Private Cloud  
  • Backup photos & videos  
  • Face-down auto lock: Keepsafe will lock itself when the device faces downward 
  • Safe Send photo sharing: Control how long the recipient sees your photo  
  • Shared Albums 

4. 1 Gallery

1Gallery a great alternative gallery app designed for managing photos. It functions as a basic photo vault, but that’s not all the app does. You can secure your photos & videos and also edit them, if you’d like.

Features:

  • Protect your privacy, secure your photos
  • AES Encryption
  • Password: PIN, pattern or fingerprint
  • Simplistic
  • Search, create new folders, moving/copying data and more 
  • Photo & video editor
  • Themes

5. Hide Something

Hide Something is a simple, minimal photo vault app. It includes all of the essential features you’re probably looking for in a vault like password protection, file support, and the ability to hide photos. If you’re looking for a very basic photo hiding app, Hide Something might be a good fit for you.

Features:

  • Fingerprint, Pattern, or PIN lock! 
  • One click to browse phone’s invisible photos in desktop browser
  • Backup hidden files to Google drive
  • Advanced image viewer displays pixel level of details
  • GIF support
  • Themes
  • Doesn’t show up in recently used apps list

Keep Your Private Photos Private. Download Cover!
